title: Desert storm: the war begins
creator_credit: Cable News Network and Stacy Jolna
brief_description: This video links CNN news coverage together to tell the compelling tale of the opening chapter of the Persian Gulf War. CNN’s ‘Special Report’ team examines the leaders, the warriors, the diplomatic ploys, the history, and the battle strategems in the early days of the war.
